meanings.definition: A device used to measure the electrical responses of the retina to light.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used an electroretinograph to check how my eyes respond to light.
meanings.sent2: The hospital purchased a new electroretinograph for eye examinations.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a small electroretinograph could reveal so much about my eyes!
meanings.sent4: The electroretinograph acted like a detective, uncovering the secrets of my retina.
meanings.sent5: The bright flashes from the electroretinograph made my eye's reactions crystal clear.

meanings.definition: The process of using an electroretinograph to diagnose eye conditions.
meanings.sent1: The electroretinograph helped the ophthalmologist identify my eye problem quickly.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the electroretinograph process was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: I never thought an electroretinograph could make eye exams so interesting!
meanings.sent4: The electroretinograph process shed light on my eye health like never before.
meanings.sent5: The electroretinograph procedure was like a magic trick for my eyes, revealing hidden issues.
